name: Vlad and Niki Superheroes
description:
Comics about monsters is frightening and curious at the same time. Superhero appears and saves everybody when it seems to be hopeless! There are a lot of exciting adventures in a new game with Vlad and Niki where our superheroes save the world! Super villains and exciting levels are waiting for you! Start a fight right now!

Every new level has stronger villain and more complicated battle. At the end of every level Vlad and Niki will have a fight with Boss. Make your heroes better and use superpower! Download our game for free and help to perform super punch at evil forces!

Please read our Privacy policy: https://policy.psvgamestudio.com/privacy_policy_appstore_clear_invest.html
and Terms of use: https://policy.psvgamestudio.com/terms_of_use_appstore_clear_invest.html
